requirements.title: Timeline artifacts persist normalized execution events
requirements.description: Ensures execution artifacts are normalized, stored, and queryable so the replay UI and marketing renderer consume consistent payloads.

validation.notes: Validates timeline persistence, retrieval, and query filters.
Unit phase captures timeline service coverage thresholds.

validation.notes: Exporter generates ReplayMovieSpec with execution metadata.
Unit tests validate export bundle generation and metadata.
ReplayRenderer generates video/gif from replay specs via Browserless (tested in unit phase).
